attributes.action: Stop the broadcast of the appalling Two Pint of Lager and a Packet of Crisps, immediatley.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This awful 'comedy' has been the scourge of British Comedy for years, its high time it stopped. In particular broadcasting double bills on BBC 3.  I would rather sit between Jason Biggs and Adam Sandler on a long haul flight as they regale me with musical renditions of their dreadful films, than sit through an hour of this feculent mess.  There are so many other UK comedies to choose from instead, Mighty Boosh? Blackadder? Fry and Laurie? C'mon!  The Biased Broadcasting Corporation are incapable of making this decision alone, time for the hand of Gord to intervene.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
